keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

unmap x
unmap r
unmap R

unmap H
unmap J
unmap K
unmap L

map xx removeTab
map rr reload
map RR reload hard
map q passNextKey


unmap f

map ff LinkHints.activateMode 
map fs LinkHints.activateMode action=focus
map ft LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text
map fh LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
map fy LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map fd LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink



map sgs Vomnibar.activate keyword=gs
map sgm Vomnibar.activate keyword=gm
map sgi Vomnibar.activate keyword=gi
map sd Vomnibar.activate keyword=dnd
map sf Vomnibar.activate keyword=fr
map sy Vomnibar.activate keyword=yt
map smd Vomnibar.activate keyword=mdn
map si Vomnibar.activate keyword=imdb
map swk Vomnibar.activate keyword=wkp
map swa Vomnibar.activate keyword=wa
map sws Vomnibar.activate keyword=site
map sb Vomnibar.activate keyword=beyond
searchEngines:
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub

gs: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
gi: https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=%s Google Images
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps

recent: https://www.google.com/search?hl=en&tbo=1&tbs=qdr:y&q=%s Google (last year only)
translate: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#auto|auto|%s Google Translator
wkp: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia
wa: https://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=%s Wolfram|Alpha
mdn: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/search?q=%s MDN
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube
imdb: https://www.imdb.com/find?s=all&q=%s IMDB

# Find your way from your home to places using Google Maps
home: https://www.google.com/maps/dir/home/%s

# Use google to search the current site you're on
site: javascript:location='https://www.google.com/search?num=100&q=site:'+escape(location.hostname)+'+%s'


dnd: https://5e.tools/search.html?q=%s 5e.tools
fr: https://forgottenrealms.fandom.com/wiki/Special:Search?scope=internal&navigationSearch=true&query=%s
beyond: https://www.dndbeyond.com/search?q=%s D&D Beyond
